comments.author: NicholasFreeman
comments.body:
> @NicholasFreeman @sowa705 did you ever discover the reason for the crashes?

@mattleibow Not conclusively, yet. In my use-case (Avalonia on Godot via [MrJul.Estragonia](https://github.com/MrJul/Estragonia)), it appear to be an issue with the symbols from MoltenVK not being exported/found. I have not had time to get back to it; If/when I do, I will post updates.
